gr.aueb.cf.ch12.bankapp

Class OverdraftAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.aueb.cf.ch12.bankapp.OverdraftAccount

  • public class OverdraftAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The OverdraftAccount class represents a bank account with the ability to withdraw amounts that exceed the account's balance up to 1000

        public void deposit(double amount)

        Deposits a certain amount of money.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be deposited.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the amount is negative.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(double amount,
                     java.lang.String ssn)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Withdraws an amount of money based on a valid ssn.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to be withdrawn.
        ssn - the given ssn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the ssn is not valid or the overdraft limit has been exceeded.
